title: NCREC Leandro Bortolon: Resilience of Cropping Systems

tasks.task: Building and increasing resilience in cropping systems for challenging conditions like drought.
subtasks: Increasing no-till practices to conserve water and reduce evaporation.
Implementing cover crops, especially in late summer and fall, to improve soil structure over time.
Avoiding excessive deep planting (more than 2 inches) to prevent crop emergence issues.
Managing planting speed to prevent crust formation on the soil surface, which can hinder plant growth.
